name: @hubspot/webpack-cms-plugins
description: Webpack plugins for using with the HubSpot CMS

scripts.check-main: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = main ] || (echo 'Error: New release can only be published on main branch' && exit 1)
scripts.release:major: yarn check-main && yarn version --major && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:minor: yarn check-main && yarn version --minor && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:patch: yarn check-main && yarn version --patch && yarn pub && yarn push
